topic.title: Cognitive Status Problem Observation - conformance rules

lines.i: A cognitive status problem observation is a clinical statement that describes a patient's cognitive condition, findings, or symptoms. Examples of cognitive problem observations are inability to recall, amnesia, dementia, and aggressive behavior. A cognitive problem observation is a finding or medical condition. This is different from a cognitive result observation, which is a response to a question that provides insight into the patient's cognitive status, judgement, comprehension ability, or response speed.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14346, CONF:14347 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.73"
SHALL conform to Problem Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14319)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14320)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:14344)
Use negationInd="true" to indicate that the problem was not observed.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:14321)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14804)/@code="373930000" Cognitive function finding (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:14805)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:14341)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14323)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14324)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode (CONF:14693)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:14349)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:14331, CONF:14588, CONF:14351)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Medicinal Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:14335, CONF:14589, CONF:14352)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Caregiver Characteristics (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:14467, CONF:14590, CONF:14468)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)
The text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:14342)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:14343)
The effectiveTime element , if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:14325)
effectiveTime, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:14326)

If the problem is known to be resolved, but the date of resolution is not known then the high element SHALL be present, and the nullFlavor attribute SHALL be set to 'UNK'. Therefore, the existence of an high element within a problem does indicate that the problem has been resolved (CONF:14327)
SHALL conform to Problem Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14319)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14320)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:14344)
Use negationInd="true" to indicate that the problem was not observed.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:14321)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14804)/@code="373930000" Cognitive function finding (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:14805)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:14341)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14323)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14324)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:14349)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode (CONF:14693)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:9059, CONF:9060, CONF:15590)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Age Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.31)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:9063, CONF:9068, CONF:15591)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.6)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:9067, CONF:9064, CONF:15592)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Health Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:14331, CONF:14588, CONF:14351)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Medicinal Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:14335, CONF:14589, CONF:14352)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Caregiver Characteristics (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:14467, CONF:14590, CONF:14468)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)
The text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15587)
reference, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @value (CONF:15588)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15589)
The effectiveTime element , if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:15603)
effectiveTime, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:15604)

If the problem is known to be resolved, but the date of resolution is not known then the high element SHALL be present, and the nullFlavor attribute SHALL be set to 'UNK'. Therefore, the existence of an high element within a problem does indicate that the problem has been resolved (CONF:16881)
value MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:10141)

If the diagnosis is unknown or the SNOMED code is unknown, @nullFlavor SHOULD be UNK. If the code is something other than SNOMED, @nullFlavor SHOULD be OTH and the other code SHOULD be placed in the translation element (CONF:10142)
entryRelationship with target entry Age Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:9069)
value MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation (CONF:16749)
translation, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @code (CodeSystem: ICD10 2.16.840.1.113883.6.3) (CONF:16750)
The text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:14342)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:14343)
The effectiveTime element , if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:14325)
effectiveTime, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:14326)

If the problem is known to be resolved, but the date of resolution is not known then the high element SHALL be present, and the nullFlavor attribute SHALL be set to 'UNK'. Therefore, the existence of an high element within a problem does indicate that the problem has been resolved (CONF:14327)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1250108616"/> <code code="514089918"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="940489248"/> <methodCode code="748599870"/> <entryRelationship> <supply> <id root="MDHT" extension="1066015930"/> <code code="220890529"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime value="20130627"/> </supply> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="186464096"/> <code code="1161880503"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="1532944237"/> <methodCode code="570453636"/> <participant> <time> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </time> <participantRole/> </participant> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="1577302137"/> <code code="40531394"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <methodCode code="869829855"/> <author/> <entryRelationship> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="1452304292"/> <code code="1951965747"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <methodCode code="955462647"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <referenceRange> <observationRange/> </referenceRange> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
